name: BOSS
content: 人人都知道我飞扬跋扈
We do what we gon' do
Every time we in the room
No one is the boss of you
You know I speak the truth
我们可以联手铸就蜕变
Do it raw do it real
脚踏实地 一步一脚印
Do what you want do what you feel
听从你的心意 以梦想铸就现实
They ain't really gonna stop us
Come on come on come on
We walking out come on what
有多少能耐尽管秀出来
Be your own boss what be your own boss
做你自己的王 主宰你的命运
Be your own boss what be your own boss
做你自己的王 主宰你的命运
Punch it in punch it out
有时人生就是这么无奈 对吧
Time to break out then we shout
是时候打破如此囹圄 高声呐喊
Freedom is a choice we make
几经波折 我们不断成长
If you got something to say
Tell it to my face yeah
那就尽管对我直言不讳
Do it raw do it real
脚踏实地 一步一脚印
Do what you want do what you feel
听从你的心意 以梦想铸就现实
They ain't really gonna stop us
Come on come on come on
We walking out come on what
有多少能耐尽管秀出来
Be your own boss what be your own boss
做你自己的王 主宰你的命运
Be your own boss what be your own boss
做你自己的王 主宰你的命运
人人都知道我飞扬跋扈

Every time we in the room
No one is the boss of you
You know I speak the truth

Punch it in punch it out
有时人生就是这么无奈 对吧
Time to break out then we shout
是时候打破如此囹圄 高声呐喊
Freedom is a choice we make
几经波折 我们不断成长
If you got something to say
Tell it to my face yeah
那就尽管对我直言不讳
I told you I'm a boss
再跟你说一遍 我就是自己的王
有多少能耐尽管秀出来
Be your own boss what be your own boss
做你自己的王 主宰你的命运
